summary:
Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina, located on the RÃ­o de la Plata. It's known as an "Alpha global city" and is famous for its European-style architecture and vibrant culture. The city was once part of Buenos Aires Province but became federalized in 1880. It gained autonomy in 1994, and its citizens now elect their government.

Buenos Aires is diverse, with many ethnic groups due to a history of immigration. It has hosted major sporting events like the FIFA World Cup and the Pan American Games. The city is the second largest south of the Tropic of Capricorn and offers a high quality of life.
title: Buenos Aires
